alert.note: Alert for Tangipahoa (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 04 at 8:15AM CST until January 04 at 6:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in New Orleans LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana... Tangipahoa River Near Robert affecting Tangipahoa Parish. For the Tangipahoa River...including Osyka, Kentwood, Amite, Robert...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tangipahoa River Near Robert. * WHEN...From this afternoon to this evening. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Minor flooding near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 14.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 15.0 feet this afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 14.7 feet on 04/04/1960. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lix. Click on the Rivers and Lakes menu for forecasts and observations. The next statement will be issued when updates are needed.
